headline: Jim Cramer on Dow Inc.: “It Could Have Another Point or Two, But That’s All”
summary: Dow Inc. (NYSE:DOW) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer expressed thoughts on. A caller asked if the stock is a buy, sell, or hold. In response, Cramer said: “No, I’ll tell you why. It had a nice bounce off the cut. It could have another point or two, but that’s all. I don’t want […]
